drupalNodeEvent.title: AirPower: The PLA Air Force and India's response

field_speakers.processed: Mr Angad Singh (Observer Research Foundation, Delhi), Air Vice Marshal Manmohan Bahadur(Retired) (Cantre for Airpower Studies, Delhi)

field_description.processed: Chinese air power has received a great deal of political attention and funding in recent years. The relative technological gap between Indian and Chinese air power has inverted from the comfortable lead India enjoyed up to the early 2000s. This interaction will explore the aviation capabilities of both nations, and address some options available to India to address both Chinaâ€™s increased capability and growing military assertiveness.
